title: Terrible!
text: Don't install this! Whenever I get in range of this device it interrupts me with a worthless popup. I can't turn notifications off for the app and can't find it in my list of applications to uninstall it!  It's like a freakin virus!

title: Do not install return the product
text: Very crappy do not recommend never works when you want it to very buggy and outdated

title: Terrible App
text: Don’t install the app. Every time I open Safari, I get a message to “enable the device”.

title: Needs work
text: does not deserve even one star, buggy app, can't edit or name timers. Try testing your app

title: Great start, needs basic features
text: Works when wifi is down! Great for resetting wifi access points across the room.  Desired features...  Have App remember pin code so you don't need to enter the code every time.  Allow turn off to be before turn on (want to reboot once a week, need to turn off then turn on).  Add a feedback option in the app (make plugable icon in lower right corner go to list of actions including send feedback, link devices - lets two devices act as one, notifications-allow app notifications for on off events, IFTT actions) allow autojoin so don't need to say yes every time I walk in the room
